pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā kupitā anattamanā evaṁ vadeti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:1.3: “chandagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo, dosagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo, mohagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo, bhayagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:1.4: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:1.5: “kathañhi nāma ayyā caṇḍakāḷī kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā kupitā anattamanā evaṁ vakkhati—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:1.7: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā kupitā anattamanā evaṁ vadeti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:1.11: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā kupitā anattamanā evaṁ vakkhati—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:1.14: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:1.15.1: “Yā pana bhikkhunī kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā kupitā anattamanā evaṁ vadeyya—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:1.16: ‘chandagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo, dosagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo, mohagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo, bhayagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo’ti,
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:1.18: ‘māyye, kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā kupitā anattamanā evaṁ avaca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:1.19: chandagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo dosagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo mohagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo bhayagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:1.20: Ayyā kho chandāpi gaccheyya, dosāpi gaccheyya, mohāpi gaccheyya, bhayāpi gaccheyyā’ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:1.21: Evañca sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi vuccamānā tatheva paggaṇheyya, sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsitabbā tassa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:1.22: Yāvatatiyañce samanubhāsīyamānā taṁ paṭinissajjeyya, iccetaṁ kusalaṁ;
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:1.23: no ce paṭinissajjeyya, ayampi bhikkhunī yāvatatiyakaṁ dhammaṁ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṁ saṅghādisesan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.1.6: adhikaraṇaṁ nāma cattāri adhikaraṇāni— vivādādhikaraṇaṁ, anuvādādhikaraṇaṁ, āpattādhikaraṇaṁ, kiccādhikaraṇaṁ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.1.16: aññāhi bhikkhunīhi. Yā passanti yā suṇanti tāhi vattabbā—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.1.17: “māyye, kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā kupitā anattamanā evaṁ avaca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.1.19: Ayyā kho chandāpi gaccheyya …pe… bhayāpi gaccheyyā”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.1.26: “māyye, kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā kupitā anattamanā evaṁ avaca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.1.28: Ayyā kho chandāpi gaccheyya …pe… bhayāpi gaccheyyā”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.1.36: ‘Suṇātu me, ayye, saṅgho. Ayaṁ itthannāmā bhikkhunī kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā kupitā anattamanā evaṁ vadeti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.1.37: “chandagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo… pe… bhayagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.1.39: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho itthannāmaṁ bhikkhuniṁ samanubhāseyya tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.1.42: Ayaṁ itthannāmā bhikkhunī kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā kupitā anattamanā evaṁ vadeti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.1.45: Saṅgho itthannāmaṁ bhikkhuniṁ samanubhāsati tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.1.46: Yassā ayyāya khamati itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā samanubhāsanā tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya, sā tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.1.50: Samanubhaṭṭhā saṅghena itthannāmā bhikkhunī tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.1.51: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.1.60: yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya āpajjati, na saha vatthujjhācārā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.2.1: Dhammakamme dhammakammasaññā na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.2.2: Dhammakamme vematikā na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss11:2.2.3: Dhammakamme adhammakammasaññā na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
